name: 10.25 & 10.26 "An Old Fashioned Wedding Parts 1&2" Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: What did Norm and Cliff get Woody and Kelly for a wedding gift?
questions.explanation:
Garbage can.

	They said they wanted to get them something practical. Carla pointed out it wasn't even a new one.

questions.text: Rebecca called Kelly and Woody's wedding what?
options: The most expensive wedding of the year
questions.explanation:
The wedding of the year.

	They had people who were royalty come to their wedding. It was a very extravagant wedding.

options: He decided not to get married.
He and Kelly actually eloped earlier.
questions.explanation:
He had sex with Kelly.

	Woody had always planned to wait until after they were married to have sex. But he said he and Kelly just couldn't help themselves.

questions.text: Complete this line said by Kelly: "I don't know my sign but I know I'm not a ________."
questions.explanation:
Virgo.

	She was referring to the fact that she slept with Woody. She and Woody could not keep their hands off each other the whole time before the wedding.

questions.text: Why did Mr. Gaines say Mussolini wasn't all bad?
questions.correct: He had his own son-in-law shot.
options: He fought against the US in WWII.
questions.explanation:
He had his own son-in-law shot.

	Mr Gaines did not like Woody at all. He saw him as unsophisticated, simple-minded, and not fit to marry his daughter.

questions.text: What was the first disaster that happened at the wedding?
options: Mr. Gaines caught Woody with Kelly.
questions.explanation:
The chef quit.

	He and Rebecca were fighting all day and finally he told Rebecca to leave. Rebecca refused and told the chef to leave, so he did - taking his crew with them.

questions.text: What the was second major disaster to happen at the wedding?
options: Sam got caught with a married woman.
Kelly decided to go back to her old boyfriend.
questions.explanation:
The priest died.

	No one had the courage to tell Woody so they had to come up with another priest. Sam remembered Kelly had an uncle who was a minister.

questions.text: What was wrong with Uncle Roger?
questions.explanation:
He was drunk.

	When he was drunk he loved weddings. However, when he was sober he remembered his divorce and consequentially hated weddings.

questions.text: How did Kelly lose the button on her dress?
questions.explanation:
Woody bit it off.

	Sam got the button from Woody and asked Rebecca to sew it on, but Rebecca didn't know how to sew. So, Cliff ended up sewing it on.

questions.text: What did they use to get the minister to perform the wedding?
questions.explanation:
Jack Daniels.

	Frasier said he tried every known form of therapy and nothing worked. Sam said he was fine when he was drunk. Frasier said, "Jack Daniels, calling, Dr. Jack Daniels."
